error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
declarationEmitLateBoundAssignments.ts(3,18): error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
declarationEmitLateBoundAssignments.ts(4,1): error TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'error' can't be used to index type '{ (): void; bar: number; strMemName: string; foo[dashStrMem]: string; foo[numMem]: string; }'.
declarationEmitLateBoundAssignments.ts(12,19): error TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'error' can't be used to index type '{ (): void; bar: number; strMemName: string; foo[dashStrMem]: string; foo[numMem]: string; }'.

==== declarationEmitLateBoundAssignments.ts (3 errors) ====
    export function foo() {}
    foo.bar = 12;
    const _private = Symbol();
                     ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Symbol'.
    foo[_private] = "ok";
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'error' can't be used to index type '{ (): void; bar: number; strMemName: string; foo[dashStrMem]: string; foo[numMem]: string; }'.
    const strMem = "strMemName";
    foo[strMem] = "ok";
    const dashStrMem = "dashed-str-mem";
    foo[dashStrMem] = "ok";
    const numMem = 42;
    foo[numMem] = "ok";
    
    const x: string = foo[_private];
                      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'error' can't be used to index type '{ (): void; bar: number; strMemName: string; foo[dashStrMem]: string; foo[numMem]: string; }'.
    const y: string = foo[strMem];
    const z: string = foo[numMem];
    const a: string = foo[dashStrMem];
